subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Diego Maradona will become Argentina’s national team coach Tuesday, leaving the team in the hands of a national icon who has a history of erratic behavior and drug abuse. He will be assisted by Carlos Bilardo, a former Argentina coach who will be the manager.
